==German== ===Etymology=== {{prefix|de|ab|fliegen|t1=from|t2=to fly}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʔapˌfliːɡŋ̩/|/ˈʔapˌfliːɡən/}} * {{audio|de|De-abfliegen.ogg|Audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|ab|flie|gen}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-strong|class=2|fliegt ab|flog ab|abgeflogen|past subjunctive=flöge ab|auxiliary=both}} # {{lb|de|aviation}} to [[take off]] (from the ground), to fly away # to [[depart]] # {{lb|de|of birds}} to [[migrate]] # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[fly]] [[over]], [[overfly]] #* ''ein [[Gelände]] '''abfliegen''''' #*: to fly over an area (''i.e. search and rescue'') ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-strong|flieg|flog|geflogen|hs|||flög|a||ab}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|to take off}} {{l|de|starten}} * {{sense|to depart}} {{l|de|abreisen}}, (compare [[abfahren]]) ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Abfliegen}} * {{l|de|Abflug}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
